documentation.description: Parameters that are accepted by all API endpoints.

pretty.description: Pretty format the returned JSON response.

human.description: Return human readable values for statistics.

error_trace.description: Include the stack trace of returned errors.

source_content_type.description: The URL-encoded media type that indicates the format of the URL-encoded request definition passed with the source parameter. For example, application/json, encoded as application%2fjson.

filter_path.description: A comma-separated list of filters used to reduce the response.
